title: OP.GG wrong info

embed.description: wazup120 / Gold 5 0LP / 67W 58L Win Ratio 54% / Vi - 10W 10L Win Ratio 50%, Wukong - 9W 8L Win Ratio 53%, Xin Zhao - 8W 2L Win Ratio 80%, Alistar - 6W 3L Win Ratio 67%, Graves - 2W 7L Win Ratio 22%

body:
Hello everyone. 
So at the moment I am gold 5 in solo queue.
A couple days ago, i played a few games at the net cafe and there was some computer issues. I could play a game and then the next game, I would disconnect every minute where my client would crash. Obviously i got penalised for this. I was put into low priority queue (20mins) and ever since then, OPGG has shown my rank has bronze 1 with 7lp. Has anyone got any idea what this is about? Is this about my MMR. Did riot degrade all my efforts o.o

replies.body: It's showing me gold 5? Sometimes it takes a while for OP.GG to update.
